DOC.brief_title: GENErating Behavior Change , An Integrative Health Coaching Genetic Risk Testing Pilot
DOC.criteria: age 18+ , presence least one following : FPG > 100 , HbA1c > 5.7 % , diabetic , LDL > 129 , triglyceride > 150 , total cholesterol > 200 , SBP > 130 , BMI > 25 , able speak understand English , able willing give inform consent diagnose CHD ( MI document coronary artery disease ) , inability ambulate participate physical activity , serious chronic disease related complication , current participation risk communication study chronic disease ,
